column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Daisy
#Text=by Andrew Willett
#Text=It was Sunday in snowy Manhattan .

#Text=Jenna was in the tub , and I was doing the Times crossword , listening to the clang of the radiators and the swish of the taxis on the slush outside , when my coffee - scented reverie was broken by a loud squawk from the bathroom , and a splash , and a flesh - upon - cold - tile sort of thump .
#Text=“ Go away !
#Text=Shoo !
#Text=Get out of my bathroom ! ”
#Text=I threw down my pen and dashed down the hall .
#Text=Jenna was picking herself up off the floor of the bathroom .
#Text=In the bathtub , a bar of soap was gaily chasing a nylon scrubby thing around the surface of the water .
#Text=“ Damned pixies ! ” Jenna said , smacking the bathtub ’s drain lever .
#Text=“ Again !
#Text=I am so tired of these things ! ”
#Text=A piteous squeak came from the scrubby thing as the water began to swirl down the drain .
#Text=A translucent little head poked out from behind a pot of organic - sugarcane exfoliating body polish , and looked at me with exaggerated puppy eyes and a trembling lower lip .
#Text=“ Sorry , kids , ” I said to the bathtub .
#Text=“ Do n’t humor them , dammit , ” Jenna said , and stomped , still naked , still wet , toward the phone in the kitchen .
#Text=She ’d be irritated by her own wet footprints on the battered wood of the hallway floor later , but right now she had blood on her mind .
#Text=Or water .
#Text=Ichor .
#Text=Whatever it is that the common Manhattan water - pixie uses for blood .
#Text=I could n’t say I blamed her .
#Text=She got the brunt of the pixies ’ odd sense of humor much more than I did , because she ’s the one who likes to take baths .
#Text=Although I will say that a pixie hiding in the sink among the dirty soup bowls makes doing the dishes an adventure .
#Text=“ Ramon ?
#Text=Hi .
#Text=It ’s Jenna McMasters in 5C .
#Text=Ramon , the pixies are out of control .
#Text=You ’ve got to do something about —
#Text=yes , I know —
#Text=Ramon , the equinox is n’t for weeks and weeks .
#Text=Really , we need you to do something sooner ...
#Text=Well , I ’m just not ready to wait that long .
#Text=We may have to try something on our own , then .
#Text=Goodbye , Ramon .
#Text=You ’ve been a huge goddamn help . ”
#Text=She hung up the phone .
#Text=“ Man , he ’s useless , ” she said .
#Text=“ On the other hand , ” I said , “ he ’s the first super we ’ve had who keeps the boiler , the door buzzers , and the electrical system in perfect working order . ”
#Text=I took the robe I ’d brought from the bathroom and wrapped it around her shoulders .
#Text=“ What is it they say in yoga class ?
#Text=Take a deep cleansing breath .
#Text=Spiral out from your navel center , and stuff . ”
#Text=“ Robert , this sort of thing never happened in San Francisco . ”
#Text=“ No , ” I said .
#Text=“ In San Francisco we got earthquakes , and there were wood sprites in Golden Gate Park .
#Text=Welcome to New York . ”
#Text=“ I keep trying to tell myself that this is cool .
#Text=But then they come at me on a Sunday morning , when I have no work to do and I ’m trying to relax and I ’m naked , and I just lose it ... . ”
#Text=“ And you take it out on the super , ” I said .
#Text=“ And now I ’m gon na have a bruise on my butt , too , ” she said .
#Text=“ Well , that ’s karma for you .
#Text=Now stretch out on the couch , and I ’ll bring you coffee and rub your feet . ”
#Text=Jenna smiled .
#Text=“ Just make sure there are no pixies in the coffee pot , is all I ask . ”
#Text=Ugh .
#Text=That was our previous Sunday morning adventure : most unpleasant , and marked by the death of a new French - press pot .
#Text=I realized that I , too , hated the pixies .
#Text=“ We need a plan , ” I said .
#Text=Ted Bundy reflects on """" Try to touch the past . Try to deal with the past . It 's not real . It 's just a dream . """"
